text_block_list.text:
The day after I had stumbled across T.M. Opera O, 
she called me up, saying "We're going training".

I'm curious as to how she normally trains… 
This thought was on my mind as I made my way 
to the location she had specified.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heheh, there you are. Let's get this training underway.
choice_data_list: Why are we in the dance studio…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Dear oh dear, I've informed you we were training so 
what else do you think we'll be doing?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: To it, then. You're in a great spot to observe me from.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Here I go — huoh!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aah! My dancing figure calls to mind the elegance of a swan…!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: At times graceful… at times rebellious!! AD, a clap of thunder, please! Ba-bang!!

It was hardly the last of T.M. Opera O's 
peculiar dance performance.
What in heavens is this training for…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh… that should do it. Right then, share with me your impressions.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Wha… Have you been observing me at all!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so be it… Given enough time, I am certain you will come to 
appreciate my expression. On then, to the next phase of training!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The water here looks as clean and sparkling as diamond… 
Why, it's almost as if it is celebrating my arrival.
choice_data_list: What are you up to here?
What are you up to here?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yours truly shall be striking ravishing poses 
in mid-air, what else? Off I am!

As my mind raced to comprehend, T.M. Opera O climbed up 
the diving platform and jumped down with gusto!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aah! My figure dancing on air calls to mind the elegance of a swallow…!!
(SPLAAAAAASH!!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! Has my dazzling display left you speechless?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hah… hah… hah… Our final training spot lies just beyond this long set of stone steps…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Here we are!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Can't you tell by the fact we have come to a shrine?
(Ch-Ching!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty spread throughout the world and fill it with cheer and laughter…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty spread throughout the world and fill it with cheer and laughter…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: —— Pray, of course.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
With that done, let's make our way back 
to the academy, before the gods should 
fall prey to jealousy in my presence!
Training finished in T.M. Opera O style, we headed back.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heheh, I've certainly managed some worthwhile training today.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
How was it for you? Has spending the day with me 
enlightened you on my magnificence yet?
choice_data_list: You see no need for conventional training?
You see no need for conventional training?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Conventional training? Have you not 
just observed my training all day?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yours truly is The Era's High King. 
Is it as such not reasonable to train in 
the manner of a high king?

T.M. Opera O insisted this was the case, but is she 
really managing like that…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Your face expresses doubts. 
It's quite alright, share them with me.
choice_data_list: Is a high king not in need of victories?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Naturally that is the case… You must be thinking 
something like the following ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
"How could someone who doesn't take training seriously 
attain any victories, let alone become the high king".

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In which case I must impress upon you 
that yours truly is serious at all times.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I believe the way I train is the best method by which to 
attain my goal of becoming the high king.

T.M. Opera O spoke with such confidence that 
I could not find words to reply with.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: …… It would seem hesitation remains in your heart.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Alas, come to this, I think it best we forget about your 
provisional appointment. Yours truly desires a trainer 
who will follow her in her dreams.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My apologies for taking up your time. 
I shall take my leave here.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: —— Now then, a rose bath sounds like the perfect way to remedy my fatigue! Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
T.M. Opera O walked off, her good humor seemingly unaffected.

Seeing her figure diminish in the distance, I pondered how I 
should have approached my conversation with her……
